articles.title: Walmart And OpenAI Test The Boundaries Of Trust In AI
articles.author: Jason Snyder
articles.summary: Walmart and OpenAI have partnered to integrate Walmart's shopping experience into ChatGPT, enabling customers to buy products through conversational prompts. This new service allows users to browse, compare, and purchase Walmart items directly within the ChatGPT interface using OpenAI's generative AI model, facilitating one-click checkouts based on natural language requests.

articles.title: AI Online Services Introduces AI-Powered Digital Solutions Promising 10X Faster Results
articles.author: Getnews
articles.summary: AI Online Services has introduced its next-generation AI-powered digital services, which include AI Digital Marketing, AI SEO, AI-Powered Web Development, and AI Social Media Marketing. These services are designed to deliver '10X Faster Results, Guaranteed' by leveraging artificial intelligence in marketing and web development.

articles.title: FAST MfB partners Water.org, NAMB to boost hygiene
articles.author: Oluwakemi Abimbola
articles.summary: FAST Microfinance Bank, in collaboration with Water.org and the National Association of Microfinance Banks, launched FastWash, a financial product designed to provide access to clean water, sanitation, and hygiene to millions of Nigerians. The product offers low-interest loans for water and sanitation facilities to households, small businesses, and communities.

articles.title: Walmart announces convenient new service for car owners
articles.author: Patricia Battle
articles.summary: Walmart is piloting contactless Auto Care Centers in select stores, allowing customers to schedule car service appointments, check in, and track their car's progress through the Walmart app. Currently, customers can only book tire installation appointments through the app, but Walmart plans to expand this feature to battery replacements, oil changes, and other car maintenance services.

articles.title: 34 Amazon Organization Products Our Readers Are Loving
articles.author: Jonathan Mazzei
articles.summary: Various new organization products are available for purchase on Amazon, including a hoodie hanger with cedar balls, collapsible storage crates, a magnetic fridge shelf, and a Bluetooth label maker.  These products aim to provide aesthetic and functional solutions for organizing various items at home, from clothing and kitchen essentials to office supplies.

articles.title: Samsung will introduce its Android XR headset at a Galaxy event on October 21
articles.author: Engadget
articles.summary: Samsung will unveil its Android XR headset, Samsung Galaxy XR, at its Worlds Wide Open event on October 21st. This headset, internally known as Project Moohan, is the first commercial product to leverage the Android XR platform for augmented reality. The company is also likely to announce the release date and pricing details during the event.

articles.title: You can make ChatGPT your personal shopper and deal hunter. Here's how
articles.author: Jaclyn Peiser
articles.summary: ChatGPT launched an AI platform that gives personalized shopping suggestions and introduced 'Instant Checkout', in partnership with Shopify and Etsy, that lets users stay on those platforms to purchase items directly. ChatGPT can suggest, compare, and explain, if you feed it specifics by role-playing your 'shopping assistant' prompt, and also give suggestions on strategies to shave down the cost, including subscribe-and-save options, cash-back plug-ins like Rakuten, promo codes, and coupons available with retailers' loyalty programs.

articles.title: We tasted Publix's new fall ice cream flavors. Here's how they ranked
articles.summary: Publix has released eight new ice cream flavors. These flavors have been reviewed and ranked to assist consumers in choosing which ones to purchase.

articles.title: Griffith Foods launches phosphate-free marinade system
articles.author: Food Business News
articles.summary: OptiYield is a new product formulated with a blend of starch and perceived-as-natural flavors.

articles.title: Swiffer Sweep & Mop Deluxe in limited-edition Wicked pink for $20
articles.author: Danielle Halibey
articles.summary: Swiffer launched a limited-edition pink version of its Swiffer Sweep & Mop Deluxe in collaboration with Wicked. The 2-in-1 sweeper and mop is available at Walmart for $20 and includes both dry sweeping cloths and pre-moistened mopping pads, designed for efficient cleaning in small spaces.

articles.title: Guardian Opens First Flagship Store In Penang To Enhance Retail Experience
articles.author: BERNAMA
articles.summary: Guardian Malaysia launched its first flagship store at Queensbay Mall, featuring a modern retail concept and an extensive selection of health and beauty products. The store introduces new services, including an AI-based skin health check and a Men's Zone, along with a curated Derma Skincare category.

articles.title: Vidwud AI: Smart Tools for Effortless Creative Editing
articles.author: Oki Bin Oki
articles.summary: Vidwud AI launched a new online editing platform powered by AI, designed to simplify video and image modification. The platform features tools like 'Swap Head' and 'AI Clothes Changer', offering users a user-friendly way to produce content faster and without advanced design skills. Vidwud AI focuses on simplicity and practicality, making it accessible for both brands and individual creators.

articles.title: New Balance is having a major Y2K moment with these futuristic $170 sneakers dropping tomorrow
articles.author: Mikhayla Dunaj
articles.summary: New Balance is launching its new shoe, the ABZORB 2000, on October 15th at 10 a.m. ET. The shoe, priced at $169.99, features a combination of ABZORB cushioning and ABZORB SBS pods, a minimalist mesh upper, and comes in two colorways: pearl grey with black and rose sugar with monarch burgundy. It also includes a sculpted midsole, printed 'N' logo, reflective accents, and a Stability Web shank.

articles.title: TV's Aldo Zilli tries supermarket spaghetti carbonaras – £6 winner is ONLY one with authentic ingredients
articles.author: Laura Stott
articles.summary: M&S launched the Carbonara Alla Romana, claiming it adheres to the traditional recipe with ingredients like Calabrian guanciale, egg yolks, and aged Italian Parmesan. A chef reviewed the product along with carbonara options from other supermarkets to evaluate the taste, quality, and adherence to the traditional carbonara recipe.

articles.title: TV's Aldo Zilli tries supermarket spaghetti carbonaras
articles.summary: M&S launched the Carbonara Alla Romana ready meal, claiming it adheres to the authentic Italian recipe with ingredients like Calabrian guanciale, egg yolks, and aged Italian Parmesan. The product was reviewed alongside other supermarket carbonaras from Aldi, Asda, Co-op, Lidl, and Tesco, with M&S receiving the highest rating for authenticity.

articles.title: Fresh finds: These are the 12 most anticipated products of the month
articles.summary: October sees a surge of new product launches spanning kitchen gadgets, tech innovations, and limited-edition beauty items. The selection focuses on usefulness and novelty, presenting a curated list of standout items.

articles.title: A walk through the full-sized mock-up of the Gulfstream G300
articles.author: Richard Burkhart
articles.summary: Gulfstream showcases a full-sized mock-up of its new G300 aircraft. This mock-up provides a look inside the design and features of the new business jet, suggesting an upcoming launch or release.

articles.title: Motorola's answer to the iPhone Air costs lesser, lasts longer, and tops up faster
articles.author: Digital Trends
articles.summary: Motorola, a Lenovo-owned company, has launched the X70 Air, an ultra-thin smartphone aimed at the mid-range market. The X70 Air features a 4,800 mAh battery, durable design, and is scheduled to go on sale in China on October 31, 2025, with an 'Edge' model arriving in Europe on October 5, 2025.

articles.title: Tyra Banks' viral hot ice cream is coming to US this winter. Here's where.
articles.author: Taylor Ardrey
articles.summary: Smize & Dream, founded by Tyra Banks, is introducing its specialty dessert 'Hot Mama: Hot Ice Cream' to New York this winter. The product, described as a liquid version of ice cream, was developed over a year by re-engineering traditional bases. The company previously launched limited-time flavors like 'Tyra's Favorite' and 'Fairy Dough Diva'.

articles.title: Skoda Fabia 130: Special edition claims to be the fastest yet
articles.author: Derek Fung
articles.summary: Skoda introduced a new limited-edition Fabia 130. The new Fabia 130 adds sporty spice to the Czech city hatch.

articles.title: Winners of the Heart Project contest announced
articles.author: Glenda Flores Solano
articles.summary: TechGiant Inc. has launched its new 'AI-Powered Productivity Suite,' featuring automated task management, intelligent data analysis, and predictive reporting. The suite aims to streamline workflows and boost productivity for businesses. It will be available next month with tiered pricing, and existing customers will receive a free basic version upgrade.

articles.title: Vitamix 5200 review: it's a legend for a reason
articles.author: Marian Bull
articles.summary: Vitamix introduced the 5200 model in 2007, considered its 'legacy' model. The Vitamix 5200 has a max blending capacity of eight cups with wide, angled blades powered by a 11.5-amp motor. Vitamix blenders come with a free seven-year warranty, with an option to add three more years.

articles.title: Wave goodbye to the wet patch as this sex blanket ‘catches every drop'
articles.author: Emma North
articles.summary: Splash Blanket has launched sex blankets designed to keep beds dry during intimate moments. The brand offers various absorbent blankets, including the limited-edition Sunflower Splash Blanket and the SoakHer Splash Blanket, which are machine washable and suitable for multiple uses. These blankets address issues like wet patches and provide a practical and soft solution for couples, bedwetting children, and pet owners.

articles.title: If you were a real Hipster, you'd be using one of these rotary keyboards (neatorama.com) 11
articles.summary: Google Japan published the Gboard Dial Version on October 1, 2025, as a concept and DIY project. Full build files are open source, allowing anyone to build their own version. The project is intended as a quirky reminder that input and accessibility considerations should be integrated into design.

articles.title: PAC Storage Showcases Ultra-High-Performance 5000 Series Storage at NAB Show New York 2025
articles.author: BOXX Technologies
articles.summary: PAC Storage will debut its next-generation storage platforms, the 5000 All Flash NVMe and 5000 Hybrid 90-Bay systems, at the NAB Show New York 2025. The 5000 All Flash NVMe system delivers high performance with throughput up to 50 GB/s read and 25 GB/s write, and up to 1.3 million IOPS, targeting 8K video editing and AI/ML workloads.

articles.title: Mozilla's Firefox Adds Perplexity's AI Answer Engine as a New Search Option
articles.summary: Mozilla's Firefox is enabling users to replace their existing default search engine with an AI-powered search option directly within the browser. This offers Firefox users a new AI-driven search experience without requiring a completely new browser.

articles.title: Now That's TV's 'The Hook Up' Premiere Brings Love, Loyalty & Chaos to Your Screen
articles.author: The Source
articles.summary: Now That's TV has launched its new original reality series called 'The Hook Up.' The show has officially premiered.

articles.title: Amazon's viral high-speed hair dryer rivals luxury models, and it's on sale
articles.author: Josie Howell
articles.summary: The Tailulu high-speed hair dryer, originally priced at $79, is now available for $49 with an Amazon coupon. Powered by a 160,000 RPM brushless motor, it delivers strong airflow, drying hair up to five times faster than traditional dryers while preventing frizz.

articles.title: Thai Aesthetics Launches AI-Powered B2B Platform to Revolutionize Global Lifestyle Sourcing
articles.summary: Thai Aesthetics launched an AI-powered B2B platform designed to reshape global sourcing of lifestyle products. The platform offers AI Studio tools to accelerate product development and features curated lifestyle collections focused on sustainability and innovation, merging Thai craftsmanship with AI-powered insights.

articles.title: This Dreame vacuum mop and robot is the AI power we want taking our jobs
articles.author: Emma Sutton-Williams
articles.summary: Dreame launched the Aqua10 Ultra Roller, a robot vacuum with real-time fresh water mopping, intelligent carpet protection, and NVIDIA-powered obstacle avoidance. It features FluffRoll technology for deep cleaning and AutoSeal carpet protection to prevent wet rugs. The robot's Upgraded ProLeap System allows climbing up to 3.15 obstacle inches and has a suction power of 30,000 pascals.

articles.title: Renault Boreal Is Launched; See the Price, Versions and Equipment of the New Suv
articles.author: Brasil
articles.summary: Renault has begun selling its new mid-size SUV, Boreal, manufactured in Brazil. The model will be exported to 17 Latin American countries and is available in Evolution, Techno, and Iconic versions, all equipped with a 1.3 TTe turbo flux engine.

articles.title: SteelSeries' refreshed Nova 7 gaming headset gets a big battery life boost
articles.author: Bashkim Iljazi
articles.summary: SteelSeries is launching the Arctis Nova 7 Gen 2 wireless gaming headset, priced at $199.99. The headset features improved battery life (up to 54 hours), simultaneous 2.4GHz and Bluetooth audio, and real-time audio control via the SteelSeries Arctis mobile app. It is available in white, black, or magenta and compatible with PC, PlayStation, Switch, Xbox, phones, and tablets.

articles.title: Walmart Integrates ChatGPT: Revolutionizing Shopping with Conversational AI
articles.summary: Walmart has integrated ChatGPT to revolutionize shopping by offering conversational AI. This includes enhanced product discovery through natural language queries, personalized shopping assistance, streamlined customer service, recipe generation, grocery list creation, and summarized product reviews. Early results indicate a positive impact, including a 15% increase in add-to-cart rates for users interacting with ChatGPT-powered product recommendations.

articles.title: LG Launches ‘Essential Series' Home Appliances in India, Targets Mass Market
articles.author: Shubham Verma
articles.summary: LG Electronics India has launched the 'Essential Series,' a new line of home appliances targeting Indian households, following its successful IPO. The series includes refrigerators, washing machines, air conditioners, and ovens, starting at ₹18,000, and emphasizes local manufacturing and features designed for Indian conditions. These products will be available nationwide beginning November 2025.

articles.title: Portable Restroom Trailers, LLC (PRT) to Exhibit at PSAI Trade Show This November
articles.author: Ein News
articles.summary: Portable Restroom Trailers, LLC will showcase its premium restroom and specialty trailers, including new restroom/laundry specialty trailers, at the upcoming PSAI Trade Show in November. Attendees can explore the innovations and meet the sales team to discuss tailored solutions.

articles.title: Van Leeuwen opens in Clarendon this Friday with discount ice cream scoops
articles.author: Katie Taranto
articles.summary: Van Leeuwen is opening a new ice cream shop in Clarendon on October 17th with a grand opening celebration that includes $1 scoops from 11 a.m.-1 p.m. and a limited-edition tote bag for the first 100 guests. The shop will feature 30 signature flavors and a new signature sundae with pumpkin cheesecake ice cream.

articles.title: MEET THE MAKERS: NS woman leaves nursing career to pursue creative passion for soaps
articles.author: Laura Churchill Duke
articles.summary: Trisha Bourgeois Lowthers operates All Lathered Up Soap Co., specializing in cold process soaps, bath bombs, and lip glosses with creative designs and scents.  The company features fun designs and focuses on using the best oils and butters, offering products like the Fair Winds sailboat soap and lines with sheep milk or salt bars and can be found at 97 Gerrish St. in Windsor or on Facebook under the same name, or online at ALUsoapco.ca.

articles.title: RelativityFest's Biggest Announcement Will Hit Hardest Far Outside The Conference Hall
articles.author: Joe Patrice
articles.summary: Relativity is making its aiR for Review and aiR for Privilege standard offerings in RelativityOne. The company also announced aiR Assist, a new natural language search application, designed to deliver insights for early stage case assessment. These new AI products are meant to assist the customers to automate legal tasks.

articles.title: LYSOL INTRODUCES THE "STINKCHECK*" TO HELP YOU SHARE THE LOVE, NOT THE STINK
articles.author: Lysol
articles.summary: Lysol is introducing StinkCheck to help people handle stinky conversations related to odors in the home. StinkCheck is designed to remind people to use Lysol Air Sanitizer, which kills 99.9% of odor-causing bacteria.

articles.title: Motorola has a super-thin Air phone too
articles.author: Dominic Preston
articles.summary: Motorola is launching the X70 Air in China on October 31st, a slim phone with a 4,800mAh battery and 6.7-inch display. The company is also teasing the launch of an Edge phone, likely the same model as the X70 Air, in Europe on November 5th.

articles.title: My Favorite Revlon Blowout Brush Is Less Than $30 on Amazon Right Now
articles.author: Lauryn Jiles
articles.summary: Revlon's One-Step Volumizer Hair Dryer is currently on sale at Amazon for 30% off, priced at $28. This styling tool functions as both a hair dryer and brush, drying, styling, and detangling hair simultaneously, with features like ceramic coating, adjustable heat settings, and ionic technology for faster drying and reduced frizz.

articles.title: Youngs Fish and Chip Shop in Seaton Carew bring back battered Babybel
articles.author: Patrick Gouldsbrough
articles.summary: Youngs Fish and Chip Shop has reintroduced its battered Babybel due to popular demand. Customers have reacted positively to the deep-fried snack, describing it as delicious. This move is part of a trend among North East chip shops to experiment with unusual battered items.

articles.title: Clickatell Celebrates 25 Years as It Enters the Age of Agentic Commerce
articles.author: Business Wire
articles.summary: Clickatell introduced industry-first features, including tokenized payments in WhatsApp and Chat-2-Pay in partnership with Visa. The company's AI-powered Chat Commerce Platform enables enterprises to deliver digital commerce and services inside chat channels. Clickatell envisions evolving its AI-powered Chat Commerce Platform into an agentic commerce layer.

articles.title: LYSOL INTRODUCES THE "STINKCHECK*" TO HELP YOU SHARE THE LOVE, NOT THE STINK
articles.author: PR Newswire
articles.summary: Lysol is launching a new campaign called "StinkCheck" to promote its Air Sanitizer, which eliminates odors by killing 99.9% of odor-causing bacteria in the air. The campaign involves reality TV star Snooki and other influencers to create social media content and encourage consumers to use Lysol Air Sanitizer. The StinkCheck campaign is designed to help people address unpleasant smells in their homes in a playful way.

articles.title: The Cordless Power Flosser Reviewers Call 'Superior' To Waterpik Is 25% Off
articles.author: Huffington Post
articles.summary: One user expresses a design preference for a specific flosser over a Waterpik. The comment suggests a comparison between these dental hygiene products.

articles.title: Utz Brands, Inc. to Showcase Variety of Innovative Products at 2025 NACS Show
articles.author: The Associated Press
articles.summary: Utz Brands will showcase its newest flavor launches and product innovations at the 2025 National Association of Convenience Stores (NACS) Show. New products include Utz Cheese Balls, Utz Ripples, Utz Kettle Chips, Boulder Canyon kettle chips, Zapp's Bayou Blackened Ranch Flavored Kettle Chips, Golden Flake Hot & Spicy Cheddar Flavored Pork Rinds, and TGI Fridays Bacon Ranch Flavored Potato Skins. Beginning in Q1 2026, Utz flagship potato chip products will feature new front-of-pack claims: 'No Artificial Colors,' 'No Artificial Flavors,' and 'Only 3 Simple Ingredients.'

articles.title: Time names Rihanna's Fenty Beauty foundation one of the best inventions of the past 25 years
articles.author: Hannah Southwick
articles.summary: Fenty's Pro Filt'r Soft Matte Longwear Foundation, launched in 2017, has been recognized by Time as one of the best inventions, setting a new standard in the beauty industry for its inclusive shade range. Fenty has expanded its line with new products like Soft'Lit Naturally Luminous Longwear Foundation and Eaze Drop Tint Stick. Additionally, L'Oréal has launched the AirLight Pro Hair Dryer, and Epres introduced the ePhD Bond Repair Nail Treatment.

articles.title: Peloton Consulting Group Launches AI Development Center
articles.author: Ein News
articles.summary: Peloton Consulting Group launched its AI Development Center, offering AI agent solutions built on Oracle AI Agent Studio. The center aims to transform business processes into AI-driven systems, providing turnkey AI agent solutions that integrate with existing enterprise systems. It delivers customized AI agents across industries and business functions.

articles.title: What I Learned Watching a Humanoid Robot Do Laundry
articles.author: Billy Perrigo
articles.summary: Figure AI launched the Figure 03, their newest humanoid robot. OpenAI is partnering with Broadcom to design and deploy 10 gigawatts' worth of AI accelerators, aiming to embed model development learnings directly into hardware.

articles.title: Hyper Unveils HyperSpace Trackpad Pro: First Premium Haptic Trackpad for Microsoft Windows
articles.author: Business Wire
articles.summary: Hyper has launched the HyperSpace Trackpad Pro via Kickstarter, a trackpad designed for Windows users. The trackpad features advanced piezo haptics, full-force sensing technology and deep personalization experience, is priced at $90 for early birds, and is expected to arrive in Q1 2026. Following the Kickstarter campaign, it will be sold for $149.99 SRP.

articles.title: Storyblok unveils CMS innovations that enable brands to stay visible and confident on the new web
articles.author: Pr Newswire
articles.summary: Storyblok announced new product features and partnerships at JoyConf. Specifically, Storyblok is launching Storyblok Strata, a vector data layer for content analysis and understanding (available next year), and Storyblok FlowMotion, an automation and integration layer connecting content with the tech stack (available in Q1). These additions are designed to enhance content delivery and observability for brands.

articles.title: CoreWeave stock has one big hurdle to overcome
articles.author: Moz Farooque
articles.summary: CoreWeave, a GPU cloud player, has emerged as a 'neo-cloud' provider specializing in AI. It operates dense fleets of Nvidia GPUs, optimized for speed and facilitating the rapid deployment of AI clusters.

articles.title: Aldi trolls Tesco and M&S with real cake sandwich
articles.author: Niamh Leonard-Bedwell
articles.summary: Aldi has launched the 'Sandwich Cake' for a limited time in its bakery aisles, priced at £1.99 for two. This product, featuring vanilla sponge and pink vanilla frosting, was developed as a response to shopper reactions to similar sandwich products from M&S and Tesco. Aldi also previously launched Dubai Chocolate Ice Cream and Angel Hair Ice Cream.

articles.title: Christmas product advent calendar (15 November)
articles.author: Dene Mullen
articles.summary: The Grocer is launching a 'Christmas product advent calendar' showcasing 24 new, innovative Christmas products for 2025. They are requesting information and high-resolution photos from suppliers, retailers, and wholesalers about their most exciting new Christmas product launches, including retail price and package weight.

articles.title: Parle-G highlights small acts of kindness in new Chhath Puja Campaign
articles.author: Afaqs
articles.summary: Parle Products has launched a new campaign for Parle-G focusing on empathy during Chhath Puja. The campaign uses a film to showcase the brand's association with family traditions and meaningful moments.

articles.title: Personatech–By The Founders Of Shoptalk, Groceryshop & Fintech Meetup–Launches the Events Industry's First Revenue-Generating AI Event Tech & Networking Programs
articles.author: Business Wire
articles.summary: Personatech has launched new AI-powered event technology and networking programs designed to generate revenue and profit for event organizers. The AI-First implementation includes features like AI Target-Finder, AI Event Concierge Agent and AI Cohesion Scoring.  The company's AI Target-Finder was launched at Future Proof Festival 2025 and helped attendees connect more quickly.

articles.title: Priceagent launches new platform and plans, putting pricing within reach of every team
articles.author: Ein News
articles.summary: Priceagent has launched new plans, including a free 30-day trial and a flexible credits model, aimed at providing small and mid-sized businesses with access to research-grade pricing insights. The platform offers features like Price Check and Price Discovery modules, along with AI-powered Insight Highlights, with pricing starting at $149 per month.

articles.title: Priceagent launches new platform and plans, putting pricing within reach of every team
articles.author: Ein News
articles.summary: Priceagent has launched new plans, including a free 30-day trial and a flexible credits model, for its pricing strategy platform. This aims to provide small and mid-sized businesses with access to pricing insights, enabling them to test pricing instantly and uncover customer willingness to pay. The platform offers features like Price Check and Price Discovery modules, along with AI-powered Insight Highlights.

articles.title: Adèle Exarchopoulos et Gilles Lellouche à l'avant-première de Chien 51, le nouveau film de Cédric Jimenez
articles.author: Valentine Servant-Ulgu
articles.summary: An apparel company is promoting its new line of high-end baby clothes. The company uses an agency to create profiles of wealthy parents to target advertising within partner apps. This allows them to reach the desired demographic for their new product line.

articles.title: Ainos and NEXCOM Partner to Expand AI Nose Ecosystem into Industrial Edge AI
articles.summary: Ainos, Inc. partners with NEXCOM International Co., Ltd. to integrate Ainos' AI Nose technology into NEXCOM's industrial edge computing platforms. The companies will jointly develop and market integrated solutions combining Ainos' SmellTech and Smell Language Model with NEXCOM's Industry 4.0 infrastructure. This collaboration aims to support intelligent monitoring, predictive maintenance, and sustainable operations in industrial applications through AI-powered scent digitization.

articles.title: MG Cyberster GT Review: Performance, Features, and Experience Analysis
articles.author: Sophie Lin
articles.summary: MG is launching the Cyberster, an all-electric roadster, with a GT version boasting 375 kW (510 horsepower) and accelerating from 0 to 100 km/h in 3.2 seconds, enabled by a 74.4 kWh battery pack. The GT version retails for CZK 1,759,000, while the base model starts at CZK 1,639,000.

articles.title: OnePlus 15 launch: Confirmed features we know so far - 165Hz display, Snapdragon 8 Elite ...
articles.author: Hindustan Times
articles.summary: OnePlus is preparing to launch the OnePlus 15, which will feature confirmed details about its design, colour options, processor, and display. A new Sand Storm colour option will also be available for the OnePlus 15 5G.

articles.title: Vivo X300, X300 Pro with Zeiss camera, MediaTek Dimensity 9500 SoC unveiled
articles.author: Deccan Herald
articles.summary: Vivo has launched [Product/Service, needs completion from full article].

articles.title: MWG Holdings Expands West Coast Cannabis Footprint With Perfect Union Store in San Diego
articles.summary: MWG Holdings is opening its 10th California location, a Perfect Union dispensary, in San Diego on October 22, 2025. The grand opening will feature exclusive promotions, brand demos, and a curated product selection, with a four-day sale offering 52% off.

articles.title: TWSC Showcases at GITEX GLOBAL, Accelerating Global Expansion with Smart Storage
articles.summary: TWSC presented its customized consumer storage products and solutions at GITEX GLOBAL 2025, including SSDs, DDR5 Memory Modules, and Mobile Storage Series. Daesang showcased its Jongga and O'food products at ANUGA 2025, with focus on products such as Mat Kimchi, Gochujang, and Gochujang sauces.

articles.title: From Manual to Autonomous: Agentic CMS Automates Governance, Compliance, and Content Maintenance
articles.summary: Kontent.ai has launched Agentic CMS, the first CMS designed for the AI era. Agentic CMS brings automation and assurance together, continuously governing content to ensure adherence to brand standards, regulatory requirements, and SEO/GEO optimization. The new CMS automates governance, compliance, translations, and large-scale updates, allowing teams to focus on creativity and growth.

articles.title: Kong Announces Konnect MCP Support to Make AI and Agentic Development Easier, More Secure, and Cost-Effective
articles.author: WFMZ
articles.summary: Kong released a next-generation enterprise MCP gateway solution within its AI Gateway. Additionally, Kong introduced an MCP-enabled Developer Portal and the Volcano SDK for agent development, marking updates to their product line.

articles.title: Salesforce's Agentforce software is coming to OpenAI's ChatGPT later this year
articles.summary: OpenAI and Salesforce partners can now sell products via ChatGPT's new instant checkout feature. This feature enables companies working with OpenAI and Salesforce to facilitate direct sales within ChatGPT.

articles.title: 31 Inexpensive Beauty Products Reviewers Have Basically Sworn Their Allegiance To
articles.author: Emma Lord
articles.summary: Gold Bond introduced firming neck and chest cream with aloe, salicylic acid, and jojoba oil to hydrate and tighten skin. Olay launched Super Serum Body Wash with niacinamide, shea butter, and collagen peptides for 24-hour hydration. E.l.f launched Lash XTNDR Tubing Mascara, to give lashes natural looking smudge proof extension.

articles.title: X App Now Lets You Write On Mobile And Continue Directly On Web, All Details Here
articles.summary: X (formerly Twitter) has launched a new feature enabling users to sync drafts between the web and iOS platforms. This update allows users to start a draft on one device (smartphone) and continue working on it on another (web). X plans to release the draft syncing feature for Android smartphones later.

articles.title: LOOK: BYD inaugurates new flagship dealer facility in Sandton
articles.author: Motoring Staff
org: The South Africa Harmony BYD Flagship Store
articles.summary: BYD has launched its new flagship dealer in Sandton, Gauteng. This new brand center, named The South Africa Harmony BYD Flagship Store, spans 5,000 square meters and can display up to 15 vehicles, offering customers a brand experience area.

articles.title: 7 Best New Target Kitchen Finds Landing This Week — Best Life
articles.author: Leah Barrett
articles.summary: Target has introduced several new kitchen products, including the Elite Cuisine Automatic Easy Egg Cooker, Brightroom Top of Kitchen Sink Sponge Brush and Caddy Organizer, Glinda for Good Stanley 30 oz Stainless Steel H2.0 Flowstate Quencher Tumbler, Threshold Wood Serving Paddle and Botanical Floral Tablecloth, Cook With Color Silicone Utensil Rest and Threshold Espresso Mugs Pumpkin. These products are available at Target stores and online, with some items like the Stanley tumbler expected to sell out quickly.

articles.title: Luxiora Cosmetics Redefines Radiance with the Game-Changing Blurré Pudding Blush
articles.summary: Luxiora Cosmetics has launched the Luxiora Blurré Pudding Blush, designed to withstand diverse climates. The blush features a unique pudding texture, provides a blurred matte finish, and includes skin-loving ingredients like Niacinamide, Peptides, and Avocado Oil. It is available in six shades on the Luxiora Cosmetics website.

articles.title: The first item I bought from the brand was its all purpose cleaner in the French lavender scent
articles.author: Shawna Hudson
articles.summary: Method offers a range of plant-based cleaning and personal care products with environmentally conscious packaging, available at Target. The brand emphasizes affordability and fresh scents in its product line, including all-purpose cleaners, shampoos, and body washes.

articles.title: Cyngn Deploys DriveMod with G&J Pepsi, the Largest Independent Pepsi Bottler in the USA
articles.author: PR Newswire
articles.summary: Cyngn has commercially deployed its DriveMod Tugger with G&J Pepsi, the largest independent Pepsi bottler in the United States. This collaboration introduces autonomous vehicle solutions to automate material handling tasks within G&J Pepsi's facilities, aiming to improve productivity and address labor challenges.

articles.title: Muller brings back much-loved discontinued yoghurt flavour from the 90s
articles.author: Tom Watkins
articles.summary: MÜLLER is reintroducing its Apple Crumble Inspired Corner yogurt, a 90s flavor, to supermarkets. The yogurt features a creamy custard flavor with an apple underlayer and crumble pieces. This is part of Müller's strategy of bringing back fan-favorite flavors from the archives, following the relaunch of strawberry and chocolate orange balls and Mississippi Mud Pie flavors in 2023.

articles.title: Morrisons introduces 'rapid' delivery service across 420 stores this month
articles.author: Rachel Williams
articles.summary: Morrisons has launched 'Morrisons Now', a new service offering grocery delivery within 60 minutes. This service is available across 158 stores, with plans to expand to 420 stores nationwide by the end of October. Customers can order up to 30 fresh food items through the Morrisons website or app.

articles.title: The robots are coming! The robots are coming!
articles.author: MIKE CARROLL
articles.summary: The Roomba 10 Max is the latest version of the Roomba vacuum, incorporating a scheduling feature, on-board camera, Wi-Fi connectivity, 'Imprint Link' technology for iRobot mop integration, and an 'AutoWash' dock that automatically empties debris, refills water, and cleans the mopping pad. These new features represent the evolution and update to the Roomba product line.

articles.title: I went to Aldi for the £5.99 Baccarat Rouge copy & left with a more exciting dupe – why is no-one's talking about it?
articles.author: Sarah Bull
articles.summary: Aldi has released new product dupes, including the Cardinal Sin eau de parfum, a dupe for Baccarat Rouge, and Desert Spirit, a dupe for Byredo's Mojave Ghost, as well as Lacura Pistachio, inspired by Kayali's Yum Pistachio Gelato scent. Aldi has also released a £6.99 Fig Tree candle, a match for the £58 Diptyque figuier candle, and a pair of beige suede mules virtually identical to UGG's Goldenstar clogs.

articles.title: 'Like Having A Tiny Wizard In Your Cleaning Arsenal': 33 Products Reviewers Absolutely Rave About
articles.author: Melanie Aman
articles.summary: Nivea introduces a lightweight gel cream with Q10 for plumper, firmer skin. Essence launches Lash Princess lengthening mascara, promising lightweight, smudge-proof, long-lasting wear. Urban Decay offers the All Nighter setting spray for waterproof, smudge-proof makeup that lasts up to 24 hours. Fine'ry has released 'Before The Rainbow' eau de parfum, featuring salty air, bergamot, and tree moss notes.

articles.title: Inside Advertising's Most Grueling New Genre: ‘You Have to Have Zero Social Anxiety'
articles.author: Katie Deighton
articles.summary: 203 Media, led by founder Josh Suggs, offers street interview ad services, creating unscripted video testimonials for brands. Clients such as Magic Spoon, Ridge Wallet, Dr. Squatch, and Huron utilize these ads on platforms like TikTok and Instagram. Huron, for example, uses the street interviews to highlight the scent of their body wash.

articles.title: La princesse Eugénie partage une photo inédite de son mariage pour célébrer ses sept ans de bonheur avec Jack Brooksbank
articles.author: Isaac Bickerstaff
articles.summary: An apparel company is planning to promote its new line of high-end baby clothes. They will use an agency to create profiles of wealthy young parents to target with advertising within partner apps. This strategy aims to introduce the new product line to a specific, relevant demographic.

articles.title: Netcracker and e& Achieve Significant Milestone in BSS Transformation Program
articles.author: Business Wire
articles.summary: Netcracker Technology announced at GITEX Global 2025 that it has achieved a production readiness milestone in the digital transformation program with e& UAE, based on Netcracker's digital-native BSS solutions. Netcracker's BSS supports e& UAE's goals related to customer experience, technology leadership, cybersecurity, and sustainability.

articles.title: Say PLS! BW Women Launches the First Ever Perfume Lotion Spray in the Philippines
articles.author: Journal Online
org: Senate Committee on Labor, Employment and Human Resources Development
Department of Social Welfare and Development
articles.summary: BW Women has launched the Perfume Lotion Spray (PLS), a 2-in-1 fragrance and skincare product, in the Philippines. The PLS collection features four floral scents and contains skin-loving ingredients. It is available at various retail locations and online stores for Php 225.

articles.title: Everything you need to know about the M&S Beauty Advent Calendar 2025 - and how to snap it up for less
articles.summary: M&S has launched its Beauty Advent Calendar 2025 in collaboration with Bella Freud. The calendar, priced at £60 with a £35 purchase, contains 25 beauty products and became available on October 9th, 2025, online and in select UK stores.

articles.title: Pierre Casiraghi et Beatrice Borromeo accueillent leur troisième enfant
articles.author: Blanche Marcel
articles.summary: An apparel company is launching a new line of high-end baby clothes. To promote this new line, the company is partnering with an agency to create customer profiles of wealthy young parents. These profiles will then be used to target advertising within partner apps.

articles.title: Chinese smart cleaning appliances gain popularity in North America
articles.summary: Dreame Technology launched a robotic vacuum in North America, achieving $1.7 million in sales within two weeks and a 362% year-on-year sales surge during the spring promotion. Xingmai Innovation Technology launched its first-generation robotic pool cleaner in early 2024 and is currently testing a third-generation model with enhanced AI capabilities.

articles.title: The Gucci Intense Oud Eau de Parfum is now 54% off
articles.author: Lifestyle Writer
articles.summary: Gucci Intense Oud Eau de Parfum is now available at Wowcher at a discounted price. WeightWatchers has launched WeightWatchers for Menopause, a new program designed by doctors and women's health experts that offers tailored nutrition guidance, symptom management, and community support for women navigating perimenopause, menopause and postmenopause.

articles.title: OpenAI wants to be the next big tech platform. A developer expert weighs in on how this is going.
articles.author: Alistair Barr
articles.summary: OpenAI is introducing a new AI-flavored App Store and other products and tools to attract developers, aiming to become the next big tech platform. The company is investing in infrastructure, a new app directory, and a new coding agent, signaling its intent to be the primary choice for developers by building the dominant conversational operating system.

articles.title: Deutsche GigaNetz and Ocilion extend MyTV HD partnership
articles.author: Jörn Krieger
articles.summary: Deutsche GigaNetz and Ocilion are extending their IPTV partnership to enhance the MyTV HD service. Deutsche GigaNetz will be among the first to roll out Ocilion's next-generation user interface and latest end devices, including the P610 set-top box based on Android TV. The new UI6 interface promises improved usability, enhanced content discovery, and intelligent voice search.

articles.title: Google rolls out Nano Banana AI tool in Search: Step-by-step guide to use
articles.author: TOI Tech Desk
articles.summary: Google has rolled out its AI image editing tool, Nano Banana, to Google Search and NotebookLM.  In Google Search, users can transform images using Lens with AI-powered editing, while in NotebookLM, Nano Banana enhances Video Overviews with new styles and contextual illustrations. Google plans to introduce Nano Banana to Google Photos soon.

articles.title: Now You Can Hide All The Sponsored Results On Google Search, Here's How To It
articles.summary: Google is updating its search platform to improve the user experience by making sponsored posts more transparent with clearer labeling. Additionally, Google is introducing a feature that allows users to hide all sponsored search results after scrolling past them once.

articles.title: Nvidia's DGX Spark, A Personal 'AI Supercomputer,' Will Debut This Week At $3,999: 'I Hand-Delivered The First System To Elon,' Jensen Huang Recalls
articles.author: Upworthy
articles.summary: Nvidia Corp. is launching its DGX Spark personal AI supercomputer this week. The product aims to deliver data center-grade computing power to researchers, developers, and students.

articles.title: America needs friends. The wearable Friend is not one of them.
articles.summary: Friend, a $129 wearable AI companion created by Avi Schiffmann, has started shipping. The device uses generative AI to respond with text in a dedicated app. It aims to provide companionship and is designed to learn and grow by understanding human emotion through conversations with the user.

articles.title: Friend zoned
articles.author: Amanda Hoover
articles.summary: Friend, a wearable AI companion created by Avi Schiffmann, was launched and began shipping late this summer. The device, priced at $129, uses generative AI to provide text-based responses in a dedicated app and is designed to be a constant companion.  About 3,000 Friend devices have been activated, and some 200,000 people are chatting with a virtual companion on Friend.com.

articles.title: Americans need friends. The wearable Friend is not one of them.
articles.author: Amanda Hoover
articles.summary: Avi Schiffmann has launched "Friend," a $129 wearable AI companion that uses generative AI to respond to users with text in a dedicated app. The device aims to provide companionship, but its launch has been met with mixed reactions, including concerns about privacy and the nature of friendship. Approximately 3,000 Friend devices have been activated, and around 200,000 people are chatting with a virtual companion on Friend.com.

articles.title: FICTITIOUS BUSINESS NAME STATEMENT 2025-B5719
articles.summary: JIMMIE WILSON CUMMINGS JR. is conducting business as INNOVATIVE CLEANING SYSTEMS at 1125 S. NORMA ST, RIDGECREST, CA 93555. The business commenced operations under this fictitious name on 10/02/2025.

articles.title: Google Search now lets you hide all sponsored results
articles.summary: Google is introducing a new feature to its search engine that allows users to hide sponsored results. This update groups all sponsored results into a single section with a prominent label and provides a "hide sponsored results" button, giving users greater control over their search experience. The new feature will also be integrated with AI Overviews.

articles.title: Samsung Released A Better Foldable Than The Galaxy Z Fold 7
articles.author: Shiraz Aslam
articles.summary: Samsung has launched the W26, a new foldable smartphone in China, considered superior to the Galaxy Z Fold 7. The W26 features satellite connectivity for emergency calls and messaging, allowing users to stay connected without cellular coverage. It is based on the Galaxy Z Fold 7 but with additional premium features.

articles.title: FG urged to prioritise service excellence
articles.author: Class
articles.summary: The Premiere launched its new corporate office in Lagos during Customer Service Week. The company aims to deliver global mobility and investment solutions for Africans seeking international opportunities, positioning itself as a global brand with footprints across Africa.

articles.title: How to Make Your Old Dishwasher Perform Like New
articles.author: Creators
articles.summary: The article recommends using specific dishwashing detergents like Cascade Platinum automatic dishwashing pods and Cascade Complete Gel Dishwasher Liquid for optimal cleaning results. It provides tips on how to properly load a dishwasher, measure detergent, and ensure hot water usage to maximize the effectiveness of the detergents.

articles.title: Hyland Expands European Cloud Presence, Enhancing Customer Access to Advanced AI Technologies
articles.author: Hyland
articles.summary: Hyland, in collaboration with Amazon Web Services, expands its Content Innovation Cloud to the AWS Frankfurt Region. This deployment offers low-latency access across Europe and supports EU data residency requirements. European customers can now utilize AI-driven capabilities for content management and workflow automation.

articles.title: OnePlus 15, OnePlus 15R: Price In India, Launch Date, Full Specifications, Design, Camera And More
articles.summary: OnePlus is preparing to launch its new flagship lineup, the OnePlus 15 and OnePlus 15R, in India, potentially in November 2025. The OnePlus 15R could be priced around Rs 44,999, while the OnePlus 15 is expected to range from Rs 65,000 to Rs 75,000. The OnePlus 15R is expected to launch with a flat OLED 1.5K display with a 165Hz refresh rate and the Snapdragon 8 Elite Gen 5 chipset.

articles.title: NVIDIA's personal AI supercomputer goes on sale tomorrow for $4,000
articles.summary: NVIDIA is launching its DGX Spark "personal AI supercomputer" on October 15, priced at $3,999. This compact device offers a petaflop of AI performance. Third-party manufacturers like Acer, ASUS, Dell, Gigabyte, HP, Lenovo, and MSI will also launch customized versions of the DGX Spark.

articles.title: Nvidia unveils DGX Spark, the ‘world's smallest AI supercomputer'
articles.summary: Nvidia launched the DGX Spark, a compact AI supercomputer designed for smaller businesses and developers, powered by Nvidia's GB10 Grace Blackwell superchip. ASUS and Dell will be third-party partners for this new class of computer. The DGX Spark is part of Nvidia's broader strategy to provide accessible AI computing solutions.

articles.title: TikToker Emily Davis' Arby's Steak Nuggets review goes viral
articles.author: Pop Culture
articles.summary: Arby's launched Steak Nuggets nationwide in early October, marketing them as juicy, hand-cut pieces of steak. The introduction followed local testing in May where it received strong feedback. However, online reviews, particularly a viral TikTok video, have been mixed, with some users criticizing the product's taste and texture.

articles.title: Google revamps search ads — See what's paid, hide what you don't want
articles.author: Adgully Bureau
articles.summary: Google has updated its Search platform with a new 'Sponsored results' label for text ads, and introduces a 'Hide sponsored results' control enabling users to collapse all text ads. The updated 'Sponsored' label extends to other ad units like Shopping ads and rolls out globally on desktop and mobile devices.

articles.title: Airties Unveils Nova: Connectivity Experience Testing Platform for Broadband Service Providers
articles.author: PR Newswire
articles.summary: Airties launched Nova, a new SaaS platform designed to automate user and application connectivity experience testing. This aims to accelerate time-to-market, increase accuracy and effectiveness, and lower total costs of deployments. The platform is purpose-built to help service providers test and orchestrate a quality experience across their ecosystem.

articles.title: Nissan Tekton name trademarked in Australia ahead of possible launch
articles.summary: Nissan has trademarked the name 'Tekton' in Australia. This trademark suggests a possible future product launch by Nissan in the Australian market.

articles.title: This humanoid robot is good at gymnastics, but is it really good at it?
articles.author: Luis Mendoza
articles.summary: The Robotics Expert Department has developed the Unit G1, a 5-inch humanoid robot, now available at Walmart for $21,600. It showcases advanced AI and robotic capabilities, including flips and kung fu moves, targeting research institutions, universities, and industrial developers. The robot's potential applications include industrial settings and high-risk environments.

articles.title: Meghan Markle Launches New Wine Under The Radar, Sauvignon Blanc, For As Ever Brand -Will It Sell Better Than Her Critically Panned Rosé?
articles.author: Jennifer Gardiner
articles.summary: Meghan Markle has launched a new Sauvignon Blanc wine under her brand, As Ever, following the release of her Rosé. She describes the new wine as 'bright and balanced' with hints of citrus and a 'smooth finish,' promoting it for everyday dinners and gatherings. This release occurred with minimal initial fanfare, differing from a formal launch.

articles.title: Centon (CEO Yoo Jeong-yeon), a premium fragrance marketing company, announced on the 14th that it wi..
articles.author: Choi Ki-Sung
articles.summary: Centon, a premium fragrance marketing company, is launching fragrance marketing services at the Maybach Brand Center Seoul. They developed a signature scent, "Maybach Brand Center Seoul," expressing the brand's class and elegance with notes of Bergamot, Black Pepper, Orchid, Heliotrope, Patcheley, and Cedarwood.

articles.title: 第25届CZBE郑州国际高端美容化妆品产业博览会落下帷幕_手机网易网
articles.author: 河南经济报
articles.summary: The 25th CZBE Zhengzhou International Beauty and Cosmetics Industry Expo concluded on October 12th. The expo aimed to promote international cooperation and innovation in the beauty industry. Citizens were seen testing new beauty products at the event, indicating the launch or introduction of these new products.

articles.title: Gaby Batshoun founded Global Business Solutions in Newport, provides insight on AI, more
articles.author: Andy Furman
articles.summary: Global Business Solutions is highlighting the use of AI tools like Chat GPT, Grammarly GO, Dall-E, Otter.ai, and Tome for business applications. These tools can assist with tasks such as writing, summarizing, designing, and organizing information to save time and improve efficiency. The company advises using these tools responsibly with cybersecurity awareness.

articles.title: ASUS Unveils AI Factory and Next-Gen Servers with NVIDIA HGX B300 systems at OCP 2025
articles.summary: ASUS unveiled its AI Factory and Next-Gen Servers featuring NVIDIA HGX B300 systems at OCP 2025. This announcement highlights the introduction of new server products by ASUS.

articles.title: Next's 'soft and cosy' £10 lounge sets that look expensive are selling fast
articles.author: Shawna Healey
articles.summary: Next is offering a Three Pack Long Sleeve Long Leg Jersey Pyjamas for £30, which consists of three loungewear sets costing £10 each. The sets are made from soft, breathable jersey fabric and are available in sizes extra small to extra large. New Look also offers a Black Borg Lounge Set for £32.

articles.title: Nissan Tekton name trademarked in Australia ahead of possible launch
articles.author: Damion Smy
articles.summary: Nissan's Australian division has begun the process to trademark the name 'Tekton'. This indicates a possible upcoming introduction of a Nissan Tekton product, potentially a new vehicle, into the Australian market.

articles.title: PawSwing Neo Pre-Sale Launches October 15 - The World's First Self-Grooming Cat House
articles.author: Ein News
articles.summary: PawSwing has announced the pre-sale of PawSwing Neo, a self-grooming cat house designed with bionic engineering, starting October 15. Early supporters can secure PawSwing Neo with a $9 deposit, unlocking a $30 discount, ahead of the Kickstarter launch on November 11. PawSwing Neo is designed to transform the quality of life for both cats and their owners.

articles.title: Absa and Nedbank tread where Capitec and FNB fly
articles.summary: Banks are introducing value-added service products. The goal is to retain existing clients and attract new customers.

articles.title: iPhone Air not only looks stunning, it's actually a great phone
articles.author: Mark Furler
articles.summary: Apple launched the iPhone Air, featuring a thin design and premium features for 2025. The iPhone Air has a 48MP camera, 6.5 inch super retina XDR display, and A19 Pro chip. The price of the iPhone Air starts at $1799 with 256GB of storage.

articles.title: Google adds Sponsored Results label lets you hide paid search ads
articles.author: Best Media Info Bureau 14
articles.summary: Google has launched a new "Sponsored results" label for advertisements on its search engine. This update, rolled out globally, groups paid listings under a single header and introduces a feature to hide them, aiming to enhance user experience and ad transparency. The new feature is designed to make sponsored content distinct from organic search results.

articles.title: Nvidia Grace Blackwell: Mini Workstations Arrive
articles.author: Sophie Lin
articles.summary: Nvidia launched the DGX Spark, a compact AI workstation, making AI development more accessible. The DGX Spark features a GB10 system-on-a-chip with a Blackwell GPU and unified memory, enabling the handling of AI models with up to 200 billion parameters. It is designed with scalability in mind allowing users to connect two DGX Sparks together.

articles.title: Krikey Launches New AI Animation App and Unveils Halloween Animation Resources: Spooky GIFs & Skeletons
articles.author: Get News
articles.summary: , a company specializing in AI-driven animation, launched its new tool that enables users to create 3D animations without technical expertise. The tool allows anyone to animate a talking 3D character.

articles.title: Why Fragrance Lovers Are Turning to Palisade Scents for Authentic Designer Perfumes
articles.author: Get News
articles.summary: Quality Brands LLC launched Palisade Scents, a new U.S.-based retailer. Palisade Scents aims to provide affordable designer and niche fragrances for Gen Z and Millennial consumers.

articles.title: Kylie Jenner faces backlash over handcuffed jail promo video for new cosmetics launch
articles.author: Fox News
articles.summary: Kylie Jenner is promoting her new product called King.

articles.title: MG Motor expands its globally successful HS line-up with the Middle East launch of the ...
articles.author: bizbahrain
articles.summary: MG Motor has launched the MG HS Hybrid+ in the Middle East. This new SUV offers a combination of hybrid performance, efficiency, design, and comfort. It is the brand's second hybrid model in the region.

articles.title: World's smallest AI computer: NVIDIA's $3,999 DGX Spark packs 1,000-trillion ops power
articles.author: Interesting Engineering
articles.summary: NVIDIA is launching its DGX Spark, a new AI developer-focused mini PC, on Wednesday, October 15th. The product will be available through NVIDIA.com and select retailers.

articles.title: Ryt Bank bets on innovation, precision in digital banking race
articles.author: Dzul
articles.summary: YTL Digital Bank Bhd launched Ryt Bank, a digital banking venture with operations starting on Dec 20, 2024, and its application publicly launched on Aug 25, 2025. A key feature is its proprietary AI technology, developed by YTL AI Labs, which understands local languages and dialects, including an AI-powered chatbot. Ryt Bank aims to provide natural interactions, targeting specific customer profiles and focusing on financial inclusion by simplifying transactions and creating an interactive experience.

articles.title: If You Have A Carefully Curated Aesthetic, But Are Trying To Spend Less Money, You'll Love These 41 Gorgeous Products
articles.author: Chelsea Stuart
articles.summary: The text presents an assortment of affordable alternatives to high-end products across various categories. Alternatives that look and feel similar to products from brands like Skims, Lululemon, Aesop, Chanel, Crate & Barrel, are mentioned, offering customers budget-friendly options. BuzzFeed's Goodful line releases colorful pans for cooking.

articles.title: Nvidia to Release ‘Personal AI Supercomputer' on October 15
articles.author: Internewscast
articles.summary: Nvidia is launching its DGX Spark, a 'personal AI supercomputer,' available for purchase starting October 15th, priced at $3,999. Featuring Nvidia's GB10 Grace Blackwell Superchip and achieving a petaflop of AI performance, the compact device targets researchers and aims to expand AI accessibility. Other manufacturers like Acer, Asus, Dell, Gigabyte, HP, Lenovo, and MSI are also launching custom Spark models.

articles.title: Best Lightweight Moisturisers for Soft, Glowing Skin – Top Picks from Myntra
articles.summary: Myntra is promoting moisturizers during its Diwali Sale, highlighting the Ponds Super Light Gel Moisturiser with Cera-Hyamino for skin barrier strengthening, Joy Hydra Refresh Ultra-Light Gel Moisturiser for cool and smooth hydration, Foxtale Vitamin C Glow Moisturiser with Vitamin C, Niacinamide, and Peptides for radiance, and Nivea Soft Moisturising Cream with Vitamin E and Jojoba Oil for daylong hydration.

articles.title: DGX Spark: NVIDIA unveils its smallest AI computer at $3,999
articles.author: Aamir Khollam
articles.summary: NVIDIA is launching the DGX Spark, a mini PC for AI development, on October 15th, priced at $3,999. The DGX Spark features the GB10 Grace Blackwell Superchip and is designed for developers, research scientists, and students to run advanced AI models locally. NVIDIA also plans to release the DGX Station, a more powerful desktop tower, later this year.

articles.title: World's smallest AI computer: NVIDIA's $3,999 DGX Spark packs 1,000-trillion ops power
articles.author: Aamir Khollam
articles.summary: NVIDIA is launching the DGX Spark, an AI developer-focused mini PC, on October 15th, priced at $3,999. It features the GB10 Grace Blackwell Superchip and is designed for running advanced AI models locally. Additionally, NVIDIA is preparing to release the DGX Station, a full-sized desktop tower, later this year.

articles.title: NVIDIA Launches DGX Spark: The Compact AI Supercomputer
articles.author: Bit RSS
articles.summary: NVIDIA introduced DGX Spark, a compact AI supercomputer designed to provide powerful AI capabilities to developers globally. This system incorporates NVIDIA's newest technologies to improve AI development processes.

articles.title: Hyundai Motor, Tate Modern unveil works of Maret Anne Sara in joint art project
articles.author: Yonhap News
articles.summary: Hyundai Motor Co. unveiled the 'wo'.

articles.title: Noise Master Buds Max launched, sound by Bose and 60hr battery life for Rs 9,999
articles.author: India Today
articles.summary: Noise Master Buds Max have been launched with sound by Bose and hr battery life for Rs.

articles.title: Everyday Cheapskate: How to Make Your Old Dishwasher Perform Like New
articles.author: Mary Hunt
articles.summary: The article recommends using high-quality dishwashing detergents such as Cascade Platinum automatic dishwashing pods and Cascade Complete Gel Dishwasher Liquid for optimal dishwasher performance. It advises users to consider experimenting with different dishwasher settings like "Heavy" or "Pots and Pans" and recommends monthly cleaning with lemon Kool-Aid to maintain the dishwasher's functionality.

articles.title: How AI Is Changing Online Marketing For Small Businesses
articles.author: Nish Acharya
articles.summary: Small businesses currently use Google Ads to market products/services through paid ads shown in search results, YouTube, Google Maps, and shopping searches. While AI tools like ChatGPT and Google's Gemini are emerging to simplify copywriting and content creation, the impact of these AI tools is to help small businesses launch better products before committing significant resources to development or advertising.

articles.title: JD plans Singles Day car launch
articles.author: Fan Feifei
articles.summary: JD.com, in collaboration with GAC Group and CATL, will launch a new car during the Singles Day shopping festival. Internal and public testing starts at the end of this month, with the official release scheduled for Nov 9 on JD's online marketplace. JD.com will handle exclusive sales, GAC Group will manufacture the vehicle, and CATL will provide battery technology and ecosystem support; the vehicle boasts improvements in safety, battery, and pricing.

articles.title: China Focus: "World's supermarket" Yiwu launches 6th generation digital ecosystem
articles.author: Source: Xinhua
org: Zhejiang China Commodities City Group Co., Ltd
articles.summary: The Yiwu Global Digital Trade Center has opened, offering advanced digital infrastructure and integrated services for global traders. Zhejiang China Commodities City Group Co., Ltd. is partnering with Alibaba Group to develop an AI-driven business model for the small commodities sector, and with Manycore Tech and Tencent to enhance digital trade solutions and infrastructure.

articles.title: "World's supermarket" Yiwu launches 6th generation digital ecosystem
articles.author: Source: Xinhua
org: Zhejiang China Commodities City Group Co., Ltd
articles.summary: The Yiwu Global Digital Trade Center has opened, offering new digital infrastructure and services for global trade. The center provides tools like an AI video creator and leverages partnerships with Alibaba and Tencent to offer services encompassing customs, logistics, and AI-driven business models. The new infrastructure supports seamless cross-border networks and live streaming to enhance interactions with international clients.

articles.title: Nvidia sells tiny new computer that puts big AI on your desktop
articles.author: Ars Technica
articles.summary: Nvidia will begin accepting orders for the DGX Spark, a $4,000 desktop AI computer. This new product features one petaflop of computing performance and 128GB of unified memory, all in a compact desktop form factor.

articles.title: Nulo Welcomes World-Class Winter Athletes in Next Chapter of 'Fuel Incredible' Campaign
articles.author: The News-Gazette
articles.summary: Nulo is a premium pet food brand dedicated to superior nutrition.

articles.title: This new Android mobile comes with FREE gadgets worth £344 when you upgrade – here's ...
articles.author: The Sun
articles.summary: The Honor 400 Pro is available for order through Three, and customers will receive four free gifts with their purchase. This suggests a promotional launch or special deal.

articles.title: THE ROCKWOOD FILES: The wisdom of the curly cord
articles.author: Gwen Rockwood
articles.summary: The article introduces the "Tin Can" phone, a re-branded version of older corded phones. This new phone is designed for kids and has limited features like no screens, apps, cameras, or internet access. It allows parents to set up a list of allowed callers and designate times when it cannot ring.
